items.title: Appeals Court Upholds $83.3M Judgment Against Trump for Defaming E. Jean Carroll
items.description: While there are reasons to be skeptical of Carroll’s claims, Trump has himself to blame for the legal blunders that led to the astonishing outcome.

items.title: Can New Yorkers Unite Against Mamdani?
items.description: The stars are aligned against a unified front to stop a radical takeover of America’s greatest city.

items.title: Lessons from the Charlotte Horror
items.description: If this is not a case for mandated psychiatric treatment and institutionalization, then what is?

items.title: I Need to Stop Watching These ‘Ballerina’ Movies
items.description: Why are the assassins learning to dance in this year’s John Wick spin-off? It’s not really clear.

items.title: How Long Will We Tolerate the Madness in Our Streets?
items.description: Decarlos Brown’s story is shocking, yet all too familiar.
